comments.raw_text:
Following on from bug #667533 the "View Page Source" context menu item is disabled for application/json data (and yet enabled for application/javascript).

From a cursory exploration of code, it looks like the mimeTypeIsTextBased function in /browser/base/content/browser.js needs to be taught about the change.
comments.text:
Following on from bug #667533 the "View Page Source" context menu item is disabled for application/json data (and yet enabled for application/javascript).

From a cursory exploration of code, it looks like the mimeTypeIsTextBased function in /browser/base/content/browser.js needs to be taught about the change.
